project_descr: PEI-Support NERI- MPI in Lao PDR

outputs.output_descr:
To strengthen the capacity at the national and local level on mainstreaming MEA objectives into MDGs and national poverty reduction strategies

Sub-Output 1: Improved capacities at the national level in mainstreaming environmental obligations and Multilateral Environmental Agreements (MEAs) within national sustainable development plans and poverty reduction strategies

Sub-Output 2
Improved understanding of policy makers who are involved in the implementation of MEA and/or environmental objectives and poverty reduction strategies on the links among ecosystem services, natural capital, eco

project_title: pei-support neri- mpi in lao pdr
